title: Lee Aha Ụfọdụ Anụmanụ n'Asụsụ Igbo
sentences:
Izunna Okafor, Awka, Nigeria
Ndị Igbo sị na ọ na-abụ a kọwaruo, a maruo, maka na onye amaghị ọfọ nna ya nwèrè ike ịkpọ ya mkpirisi osisi nkịtị
Ọ bụ n'ihi nke a ka o jiri dị mkpà idepụtesi aha ụfọdụ anụmanụ na ihe a na-akpọ ha n'asụsụ Igbo
Ọ bụ ihe doro anya na ụfọdụ ndị Igbo amaghị ihe a na-akpọ ụfọdụ anụmanụ n'asụsụ Igbo, ebe aha anụmanụ ụfọdụ yiri onwe ha na-agbasàsịkwa ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ anya
Nke ahụ wee bụrụzie ihe mgbagwòjuanya nyéré ụfọdụ mmadụ
O nwèrè anụ ị na-achọ aha ya n'Igbo, edemede a ga-enyere gị aka
Ebe ọkụ nyụọrọ taa, a wụsa ọwa; izuụka ọzọ, anyị ebidokwa ebe anyị kwụsịrị

Aha bekee ụfọdụ anụmanụ na ihe a na-akpọ ha n'asụsụ Igbo gụnyèrè: 
Guinea Fowl — Ọgazị
Duck —Ọbọgwu
Turkey —Tolotolo/Torotoro 
Ostrich — Enyi Nnụnụ
Pigeon — Nduru/Ndulu
Antelope — Ele/Ene
Bed Bug — Chinchi
Ram — Ebune/Ebule/Ebili
Squirrel — Ọsa
Hyena — Nkịta Ọhịa/Nkịta Ọfịa
Dog—  Nkịta
Horse — Ịnyịnyà
Camel — Ịnyịnyà Ibu
Wall Gecko — Agu Ụnọ
Egret – Chekeleke
Snake — Agwọ
Chicken — Nwa Ọkụkọ
Pig — Ézì
Elephant — Ényí
Monkey — Ènwè
Chimpanzee — Àdáka
Gorilla — Ọzọdịmgba
Rat —  Oke
Hen — Nnekwu Ọkụkọ
Cock — Okeọkpà
Fowl — Ọkụkọ
Crocodile  — Agụiyi
Cat — Buusu/Nwonogbo/Nwamba
Toad — Awọ
Frog — Mbara/Mbala/ Nte/Akiri
Lizard — Ngwere/Ngwele
Mosquito —Anwụ Ntà
Grasshopper — Ụkpana
Kite — Nkwọ
Spider — Ududo
Praying Mantis — Ogolongolo/Ogonongono
Earthworm — Ídìdè
Cricket —Mbụzụ/Mgbaja
Bat — Ụsụ
Scorpion — Akpị
Bee — Añụ
Crab — Nshịkọ
Millipede — Esu
Cockroach — Ụchịcha
Worm — Òkpò
Centipede — Agbakụrụ/Ọgbakụrụ
Grasscutter — Nchì
Woodpecker/Speight — Ọtụrụkpokpo/Ọtụkpokpo
Civet —  Edi/Edi Ụra
Butterfly — Oloko Mbụba/Olokoro Mbụba
Chameleon — Ugwumagala/Ugwumagana
Fox — Nyanwụrụmede
Fish — Azụ
Owl = Ikwìkwii/Iyi Ọchị
Pig — Ezì
Lion — Ọdụ
Tiger — Agụ
Leopard — Agụ Awọlọ/Agụ Awọrọ
Wasp — Èbù
Weaver ant — Ídò
Porcupine — Ébì/Óbì Ọgwụ
Shrew — Nkakwụ/Nkapị 
Rat — Oke
Eleke Ntị Ọba — Swallow Bird
Hog — Ezi Ọhịa
Hawk —Agụmbu
Periwinkle — Isam
Bush Fowl — Ọkwà
Black Hawk — Mgba
Goose — Ọbọgwụ Mmiri
Boa Constrictor — Eke Ọgbà
Reticulated Python — Eke Ukwu
Hippopotamus —Akụm Tiwara Ụgbọ/Utobo
Iguana — Ngwèrè Aghọ
Egret — Chekeleke
Donkey — Jakị
Turtle — Mbe Mmiri
Eel — Azụ Ikoro
Dragon Fly —Tatambeneke/Tatambeleke
Maggot — Ikpùrú
Buffalo — Atụ
Wolf — Agụ Owulu
Sparrow — Nza
Parrot — Icheoku 
Viper — Abụ Ala/Abụala
Locusts —Igwulube
Galagos/Bush Baby — Ikìlì/Ikìrì
Gaboon Viper = Echi Eteka
Crayfish — Isha

Maka Onye Dere Edemede A:
Izunna Okafor bụ nwaafọ Ebenatọr dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Nnewi Sawụtụ nke steeti Anambra
Ọ bụ onye edemede iduazị na abụ, onye nta akụkọ na onye nkwàlite asụsụ Igbo
Ọ gụrụ na mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n'Awka, bụ ebe o mere maka ihe ọmụmụ nhazi ọhanaeze bụ 'Public Administration' n'olu bekee
Dịka onye edemede, o nwetala ntúrú ùgò na nkwanye ùgwù karịrị iri abụọ na ise n'ihe gbasaara edemede, site n'ala anyị na n'ogoogo mba òfèsi

Nturu ùgò na nkwanye ùgwù ndị ahụ gụnyere: Nigerian Writers Award/Indigenous Writer of The Year 2015/2016; Pita Nwanna Award for Igbo Literature 2015; Nigerian Heritage Icon Award/Young Writer of the Year Federal Republic of Nigeria 2016; Anambra Exclusive Youth Choice Award/Youth Writer of The Year 2016; Future Award Africa 2016/African Prize For Education; SLAM Hero Youth International Award/Innovative Youth of the Year 2016;  Inspire Award/Outstanding Youth in Academics 2017; Ezenwa Ohaeto Prize for Young Nigerian Novelists 2015; Campus Best Writer/Journalist of The Year 2018, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Dịka onye nta akụkọ, ọ na-arụ n'ụlọ mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ National Light, Ka Ọ Dị Taa na Sportslight Xtra, ma na-arụkwa n'ụlọ ọrụ Igbo Radio
Izunna na-ede akwụkwọ n'asụsụ Igbo na n'asụsụ bekee, ma bụrụkwa onye e jìrì ịkwàlìtè asụsụ na omenala Igbo wee mara
O deela akwụkwọ asatọ, ma nwekwa edemede karịrị narị asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ o bipùtagòrò n'ìkùkù
Ọ bụ onye isi òtù jikọtara ndị ntorobịa na-ede akwụkwọ n'ala Nigeria, ngalaba steeti Anambra
